sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card ref="card" class="project-card" color="blue darken-2" outlined :elevation="elevation" @click="onClick" @mouseenter="onMouseEnter" @mouseleave="onMouseLeave">
    <v-card-title class="project-name">{{ projectName }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text class="student-count">{{ studentCount }} Students</v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    projectName: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    studentCount: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    elevation: {
      type: [Number, String],
      default: 1
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onClick() {
      // Emit a click event when the card is clicked
      this.$emit('click');
    },
    onMouseEnter() {
      // Add hover effect when mouse enters the card
      this.$refs.card.classList.add('hover-effect');
    },
    onMouseLeave() {
      // Remove hover effect when mouse leaves the card
      this.$refs.card.classList.remove('hover-effect');
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.project-card {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px; /* Adjust max-width as needed */
  margin: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: box-shadow 0.3s; /* Smooth transition for shadow effect */
}

.project-card.hover-effect {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Shadow effect on hover */
}

.project-name {
  font-size: 18px; /* Adjust font size */
  font-weight: bold; /* Adjust font weight */
  color: white; /* Text color */
}

.student-count {
  font-size: 14px; /* Adjust font size */
  color: #0c0b0b; /* Text color */
}
</style>
